articles.summary: The largest cryptocurrency in the world, Bitcoin (BTC) is trading under immense pressure. One Bitcoin is now worth around $17,000, which was almost worth around $69,000 in November 2021. Since then, Bitcoin has been on a downward trajectory and now it almost looks impossible that it will ever recover back to the heights that it witnessed long back in 2021. So what should you do if you are currently invested in Bitcoin? Should you run a mile or have high hopes that Bitcoin will bounce back soon to its highest levels soon.

articles.summary:
MicroStrategy accumulated 2,501 Bitcoin in the bear market despite the MSTR stock price hitting a 6-month low.
The Bitcoin Bull Michael Saylor announced on Twitter that MicroStrategy increased its Bitcoin holdings. The tech company now holds 132,500 Bitcoin acquired for $4.03 billion at an average price of $30,397.MicroStrategy Sold Bitcoin for the First Time
According to a Form 8-K, MicroStrategy added a net of 2501 Bitcoin to its portfolio. The company first accumulated 2,395 Bitcoin from Nov. to Dec.
